project_abstract.cdata: The project objective is to assist Beijing Municipality to plan cost-effective strategies for a comprehensive environmental protection program, strengthen the policy and institutional framework required, and support priority investments needed to start the process.  The project will address pollution problems associated with air and water quality, and the disposal of domestic and industrial solid wastes.  The physical works include: (a) the construction of sewer networks to prevent pollution of groundwater and the city's waterways; (b) the construction of a pressurized hot water piping system for district heating to alleviate air pollution from the burning of coal at domestic residences; (c) renovation of a number of highly polluting industries, and, in some cases, relocation of these industries from the inner city area; and (d) construction of a sanitary landfill and procurement of equipment for municipal solid waste disposal.  Technical assistance will be included for studies to develop cost effective plans which consider collectively the environmental goals and resource needs between the various economic and service sectors in order to arrive at an optimal solution that can be sustained by the municipality.  A training component will be included to help improve the environmental management capability of key staff of the Environmental Protection Bureau and institutions providing urban environmental services.

P003564.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>北京环保项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是协助北京市制定具有成本效益的战略，用以指导实施综合环保工程；加强必要政策制度框架；支持启动这一进程所需的重点投资。项目将处理空气质量和水质污染问题以及生活和工业垃圾处置问题。工程建设内容包括：（1）铺设排污管网，防止地下水污染和城市河道污染；（2）建立集中供热增压抽水系统，减轻居民燃煤取暖造成的空气污染；（3）对污染严重工业企业进行改造，将部分企业迁出内城区；（4）建设卫生填埋场，购置市政垃圾处理设备。项目将设置技术援助子项目，支持开展相关研究，以制定统筹考虑环境目标以及各类经济领域和服务业资源需求且具有成本效益的规划，明确具有可持续性的最佳解决方案。项目也将设置培训子项目，帮助提升北京市环保局和城市环境服务提供机构人员的环境管理能力。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
